name: Becker Büttner Held PartGmbB
goal: Becker Büttner Held (BBH), a joint consulting of lawyers, accountants and tax auditors provides comprehemsive advisory with the main focus on the energy and infrastructure industry. Further practice areas: media and copyright law, tax law, auditing, civil and commercial law, public law.
interests: Budget, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy Union, Internal Energy Market
Water Framework Directive
WEEE Directive
Circular Economy Directive
Renewable Energy Directive
